attributes.action: make financial education compulsory to teach in secondary schools
attributes.background: We want financial education to be taught in all secondary schools and to make it apart of the curriculum. We think it is vital for teenagers to learn the importance of money, to help guide us, shape our futures and make sure we are fully prepared for our path after education.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Legally require all secondary schools in England to teach financial education
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701663
